summary: This is an email from defense attorney Christian Everdell transmitting the defense's Rule 16 disclosure in the Epstein case to the government, with multiple attachments including certifications, invoices, records, and legal documents such as the Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).

persons.name: A. Farmer

Everdell is communicating legal disclosures to Menninger, indicating they are involved in the same legal case, likely on the defense side.

events.title: Defense Rule 16 Disclosure Letter
events.description: The defense sent a Rule 16 disclosure letter to the government, as indicated by the attached PDF filename.

keyFacts: The defense team transmitted a Rule 16 disclosure to the government in November 2021, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
Attachments include certifications from AT&T and FedEx, invoices, Interlochen records, a redacted release for A. Farmer, and the Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).
The email is from Christian Everdell of Cohen & Gresser LLP, a law firm with offices in multiple international cities.
The document shows the defense is providing discovery materials including communication and shipping records as part of legal requirements.
